text: The 2019 Women's South American Volleyball Championship was the 33rd edition of the Women's South American Volleyball Championship held in Cajamarca, Peru and organised by South America's governing volleyball body, the Confederación Sudamericana de Voleibol (CSV). ==Competing nations== The following national teams participated: * * * * * * * * ==Preliminary round== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the Semifinals |- |width=10px bgcolor=#dfefff| ||Qualified for the 5th–8th place classification |} ===Pool A=== |} |} ===Pool B=== |} |} ==Final round== ===5th–8th classification=== ====5th–8th semifinals==== |} ====5th place match==== |} ===Championship=== ====Semifinals==== |} ====Bronze medal match==== |} ====Final==== |} ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=180|Team |- align=center | |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center | |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center | |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |4 |style="text- align:left;"| |- align=center |5 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |6 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |7 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |7 |style="text-align:left;"| |} {| style="text-align: center; margin-top: 2em; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" |- | 14–woman Roster |- | Fabiana Claudino (c), Mara Leão, Macris Carneiro, Gabriela Candido, Amanda Francisco, Roberta Ratzke, Sheilla Castro, Ana Carolina da Silva, Suelen Pinto, Leia Silva, Ana Beatriz Correa, Drussyla Costa, Maira Claro, Lorenne Teixeira |- | Head Coach |- | José Roberto Guimarães |} ==Awards== *Most Valuable Player : Lorenne Teixeira *Best Setter : María Marín *Best Outside Spikers : Amanda Coneo : Karla Ortiz *Best Middle Blockers : Mara Leão : Ana Beatriz Correa *Best Opposite Spiker : Sol Piccolo *Best Libero : Juliana Toro ==External links== *Official website Category:Women's South American Volleyball Championships South American Volleyball Championship Category:International volleyball competitions hosted by Peru Category:2019 in South American sport South American Volleyball Championship South American Volleyball Championship
title: 2019 Women's South American Volleyball Championship
